content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.

content: Thank you for coming to see my apartment. Based on the size of the apartment and its location in the city, I am looking for a rental price of 800 Euros per month. Is that something you can agree to?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am Hassan Rahman and I need to rent an apartment. I have already seen the apartment and I am ready to agree on a rental price. How much are you looking for?
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Hello Hassan, I am glad to hear that you are interested in renting the apartment. As discussed earlier, I am looking for a rental price of 800 Euros per month. Is that something you can agree to?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, that is ok for me. I will agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.

I am Hassan Rahman and this is a student apartment. I am dependable and responsible, and I would like to be on good terms with my landlord. Is there anything else I need to know before signing the lease agreement?

I think that is all for me. Thanks for your time.

I will sign the lease agreement and pay the first month's rent of 800 Euros on the 1st of next month.
name: Hassan Rahman

content: Thank you for agreeing to the rental price, Hassan. It was a pleasure to meet you. Before signing the lease agreement, I would like to make a few things clear. Firstly, the rental price is subject to change if you decide to stay longer than one year. I will inform you of any changes in advance. Secondly, I would like to remind you that the apartment is not furnished and you will need to provide your own furniture. Lastly, please make sure to pay the rent on time and in full each month. If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact me.
name: Heinrich Heine
